projects.name: ViewIt (An Online Video Streaming Platform)
projects.description: This is an Online Video Streaming Platform (like Youtube) that is built with nodejs, expressjs, mongodb, mongoose, jwt, bcrypt, and other tools. This application website is similar to Youtube with all the features like login, signup, upload video, like, dislike, comment, reply, subscribe, unsubscribe, and many more.
